current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the
		  interment in national cemeteries under the control of the National Cemetery
		  Administration of individuals who served in combat support of the Armed Forces
		  in the Kingdom of Laos between February 28, 1961, and May 15, 1975, and for
		  other purposes.

sponsor.#tail:
introduced
			 the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

header.#text:
Eligibility for interment in
			 national cemeteries for certain service in the Kingdom of Laos

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, is
			 amended by adding at the end the following new paragraph:
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Section 2402(a) of title 38, United States Code

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
determines served in combat support of the Armed Forces (including combat
				support involving any covert action of the United States, as defined in

in the Kingdom of
				Laos during the period beginning on February 28, 1961, and ending on May 15,
				1975; and

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
section
				503(e) of the National Security Act of 1947

text.#text:
at the time of
				the individual's death was a citizen of the United States or an alien lawfully
				admitted for permanent residence in the United
				States.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall apply with
			 respect to an individual who dies on or after the date of the enactment of this
			 Act.
